question: Which institution has launched ‘RuPay Festive Carnival’ to encourage contactless cashless payment?
explanation:
The National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) has recently launched a campaign named 'RuPay Festive Carnival'.
Under the campaign, the institution provides benefits and discounts up to 65 per cent on purchase of various branded items using RuPay card. This move is aimed at encouraging contactless and cashless payments.
